page.title: 11Churches
page.content: There are five churches in our survey area. A number of denominations are represented. {St. Bartholomew's Church of England } was built by Robert Adam in 1773. At present there are about 14 services held weekly. {St. John the Divine C.of E.}was built in 1956-7. Princess Margaret attended the Silver Jubilee celebrations. {Corpus Christi Roman Catholic}was completed in 1958 and a Primary School on the same site was opened in 1959. {Meredith Road Baptist Church}was rebult on this site after being demolished in the city centre during the 1939-45 war. {Willenhall Free Evangelical Church} started in shop premises in the Willenhall Precinct until 1959 when work began on a new building. They produce a monthly magazine - 'CONTACT'
